questions.question: What type is Pikachu?
questions.hint: This Pokémon can generate electricity from its cheeks.
questions.fact: Pikachu is the mascot of the Pokémon franchise.

questions.question: Which Pokémon evolves into Charizard?
questions.hint: It’s the middle stage of a fiery evolution.
questions.fact: Charizard can melt boulders with its fiery breath.

questions.question: What is the first Pokémon in the Pokédex?
questions.fact: Bulbasaur stores energy in the bulb on its back.

questions.question: Which Pokémon sleeps most of the time?
questions.hint: It blocks roads by sleeping on them.
questions.fact: Snorlax’s daily routine consists of eating and sleeping.

questions.question: What type is weak against Electric?
questions.hint: Electric attacks are very effective on this type.
questions.fact: Squirtle’s shell helps it defend against attacks.

questions.question: Which Pokémon can evolve into eight different forms?
questions.hint: It’s known for its unstable genetic code.
questions.fact: Eevee’s evolutions depend on environmental factors and friendship.

questions.question: What’s the legendary bird of fire?
questions.hint: Its wings are said to glow with flames.
questions.fact: Moltres is one of the three Legendary Birds of Kanto.

questions.question: Which Pokémon is known for singing lullabies?
questions.hint: It gets angry when people fall asleep during its songs.
questions.fact: Jigglypuff’s voice can put even the strongest to sleep.
